Name: Shanavas Shakeer
Description: Passionate Test Automation Professional with 7 years of experience in GUI Test automation, aiding tools creation, framework design and web service automation adapting to Agile scrum and waterfall  methodologies on Insurance and Banking domain

roles.title: Test Engineer
roles.description:
• Preparation of test scenario as per the functional and business requirements.
• Preparation of test Scripts and test cases as per the functional and business requirements.
Responsible for Data setup activity and executing test Scripts and test cases
• Reporting defects found during testing and Retest the defects if the defect is fixed.
• Co-ordination with development team on defect fixes (By helping with testing in Developmental
Environment if there are more defects to be fixed). Involved in Automation, Sanity, ST, SIT and
Regression, preparing daily interim and EOD report to client with excel macro
Testing Tools: Quality Centre, Excel VBA, and QTP.

roles.title: Senior Test Engineer
roles.description:
• Responsible for executing test Scripts and test cases.
• Retesting and closing the defects if the defect is fixed.
• Involved in Automation, Sanity, UAT and Regression,
• Preparing daily interim and EOD report to client with excel macro.
Testing Tools: HP ALM, UFT, VB script, Test Complete 12.30, Selenium with Test NG framework, BDD
Cucumber, API testing using soap UI/ Rest Assured.

roles.title: Senior Test Engineer
roles.description:
• Responsible for designing complex automation test suites/scenarios and frameworks.
• Automated manual testcases using selenium with TESTNG and serenity framework and create Test Reports using
external libraries like extent and allure reporting.
• Setup continuous deployment and Integration of applications using Jenkins and Subversion control.
Testing Tools: Serenity and webdriverIO framework, BDD Cucumber, API testing using Rest Assured framework.

Certificates.CertificateName: Automation Anywhere Certified Advanced RPA Professional (V11.0)

roles.title: Test Engineer
roles.description: Create and execute automation test scripts

LocalExperiences.CustomerFeedback: Shanavas joined us around the end of project as a replacement of resource for just 3 weeks (which extended to 5 weeks) period and we had the concern of his performance in this short period of time where he has to learn and understand the new application functionality and perform some quite complex integration transactions which he not only learnt even excelled at it and not only impressed even shocked us with his technical skills, speed and performance.Shanavas has proved to be a very dedicated, smart, thorough and avid learner along with an excellent communication, reporting and testing skills. He worked dedicatedly as a team player and never hesitated on picking up new task with minimal supervision. I felt like we haven’t utilised his complete skillset due to restrained environment and limited engagement.Resources like him are hard to find and I wish him every success in his future endeavours!! Will be more than happy to engage him back if any opportunity arises!
